english.segment1: Look at the line. You drawn yourself. So hard. To push past someone else. Why has. Your head grown so. Hat's to big don't you think so?
english.segment2: Ego bigger than a stage. Why prove yourself to everyone. Be careful you might fall down
english.segment3: Hey I think. They're looking now. Now your god. Maybe a clown. Proud like you raised it well. Ill mannered looks like hell
english.segment4: Ego bigger than a stage. Why prove yourself to everyone. Be careful you might fall down
english.segment5: Where are you, your lost inside. Hiding behind. The worlds lie.
